document.masterDocTitle: A review of the natural history of adult Cetoniinae (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae) from Argentina and adjacent countries

subSubSection.paragraph:
Literature food records. BRAZIL : localities not stated, in flowers of “ Acácia comúm”,
Acacia longifolia
( Mimosaceae ); L. O .T. Mendes (personal observation), on “abacateiro”,
Persea americana
( Lauraceae ); Zikán & Zikán (personal observation), in flowers of “abacaxi”,
Ananas sativus
( Bromeliaceae ); E. Bentes (personal observation), on fruits of “ameixeira”,
Prunus domestica
( Rosaceae ); on “arroz”,
Oriza sativa
( Poaceae ); on “batatinha”,
Solanum tuberosum
( Solanaceae ); on flowers and fruits of “caquizeiro”,
Diospyrus kaki
; on flowers of “cebola”,
Allium cepa
( Liliaceae ); R.A. Rodríguez (personal observation), on fruits of “coqueiro da Bahia ”,
Cocos nucifera
( Arecaceae ); on flowers and fruits of “figueira cultivada”,
Ficus carica
; on “goiabeira”,
Psidium guayava
( Myrtaceae ); L. O .T. Mendes (personal observation), on “gravatá”,
Bromelia
sp. ( Bromeliaceae ); on green part of “milho”,
Zea mays
; on flowers and fruits of “pereira”,
Pyrus communis

( Rosaceae ); on flowers and fruits of “videira”,

,

,
